title: Server down?
body: Uhhh is it just me or can I not connect?

replies.body:
Oce is back up, UPDATE: 28/04 @ 7:38pm AEST

You should be able to login to the client again (The problem is not 100% resolved so rank queues will remain disabled)
I'm having the same issue And getting *Did not Receive a response from the server; retrying (attempt 1-3)

The OCE server is currently down as of 28/04/16 7:15pm AEST.

UPDATE: 28/04 @ 7:17pm AEST

The issue is currently being investigated and should be resolved soon.

UPDATE: 28/04 @ 7:20pm AEST

Loss prevented has been enabled. - From SephirothSG
The server is quiet a joke isn't it. Dealing with LAG issues on a weekly basis. Server problems on a fortnightly basis. Servers must be run on 386's.
I mean you're not wrong, but I appreciate not having to play on 190 Ping in NA and I'm sure Riot has become aware and are trying to resolve these issues asap.
